inclusion.criterion: histologically confirmed epithelial or biphasic mesothelioma not amenable to potentially curative surgical resection
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: at least one prior chemotherapy regimen with FDA approved regimen of a platinum-based therapy in combination with pemetrexed
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: histologically confirmed advanced (Stage IIIB/IV) lung adenocarcinoma
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: mesothelin expression in at least 5% of cells as assessed in archival tumor tissue samples
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: total Bilirubin less than or equal to 1.5 X institutional upper limit of normal (ULN)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: subjects with recurrent, locally advanced unresectable or metastatic adenocarcinoma of the pancreas
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: total Bilirubin less than or equal to 2 X institutional upper limit of normal (ULN)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: measurable disease, defined as at least one lesion that can be accurately measured in at least one dimension
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: age greater than or equal to 18 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: performance status (Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG)) less than or equal to 1
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: uncontrolled medical illness including, but not limited to, ongoing or uncontrolled, symptomatic congestive heart failure (American Heart Association (AHA) Class II or worse)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of CAD and recently noted abdominal mass. She presents with fevers/rigors and bandemia. The results of the biopsy were consistent with pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
